title: College football national television schedule for the 2019-20 season
text:
CLOSE

The college football season opens on Aug. 24 with two games, including a Sunshine State showdown between Florida and Miami (Fla.) in Orlando. The season kicks off in full the following weekend.

The final game of the season will take place at the College Football Playoff championship game on Jan. 13, 2020 in New Orleans.

Below are games scheduled for national networks, with listed times p.m. Eastern unless otherwise noted. Dates and times are subject to change.

Most Saturday games on ABC, CBS, FOX, FS1 and ESPN's networks post-Week 3 are announced between two weeks and six days in advance, so game times and TV information will be added throughout the season.

description: Want to know how to watch the biggest games college football games this season? Here's a list of the broadcast schedule.
